articles.content: Yuzvendra Chahal will be one of the many players who will go under the hammer in the Indian Premier League mega auction, which takes place in Bengaluru later this month. The leg-spinner, who had been… [+1844 chars]

articles.title: 'Saw him play in that series. I was like WOW': Nick Knight hails 'wonderful' India youngster, calls him 'really special' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: England legend Nick Knight has reserved a special praise for India's 22-year-old cricketer. | Cricket
articles.content: The Indian cricket team has no death of young and impressive talent. From the likes of Mohammed Siraj to Rishabh Pant to Shubman Gill to Prithvi Shaw, India have an abundance of talent to choose from… [+2473 chars]
